summary: Email correspondence between legal professionals regarding a letter about Jeffrey Epstein and the Palm Beach Daily News, indicating coordination between state and federal prosecutors on the Epstein case.

persons.name: Jack Goldberger
persons.context: Sends email stating 'We will deal with the state' and mentions filing an addendum, indicating involvement in legal proceedings related to Epstein.

persons.name: Lefkowitz
persons.context: Recipient of email correspondence, attached letter concerns Epstein and the Palm Beach Daily News.

connections.description: Email correspondence regarding legal matters involving Epstein, indicating coordination between legal professionals.

events.title: Email exchange about Epstein letter
events.description: Email correspondence regarding a letter concerning Jeffrey Epstein and the Palm Beach Daily News, with mention of dealing with state authorities and filing an addendum.

keyFacts: Email correspondence from September 17, 2008 discusses a letter concerning Jeffrey Epstein and the Palm Beach Daily News.
Jack Goldberger states 'We will deal with the state' indicating coordination between state and federal authorities on the Epstein case.
An addendum has been filed according to the email, suggesting ongoing legal proceedings or documentation.
The correspondence involves Assistant U.S. Attorney Lefkowitz as a recipient of the communication.
